https://www.thetimes.com/uk/environment/.title: Pressure group Just Stop Oil will target fossil fuel production
https://www.thetimes.com/uk/environment/.text:
The successor movement to Insulate Britain was launched yesterday and delivered an ultimatum to Downing Street that if its demands were not met it would be its “duty to intervene”.
The letter was delivered by members of Just Stop Oil (JSO), formed by Roger Hallam, the mastermind behind Extinction Rebellion and Insulate Britain, which brought motorways and roads to a standstill 19 times between September and November last year.
The ultimatum called for the government to make “a statement that it will immediately halt all future licensing and consents for the exploration, development and production of fossil fuels in the UK”.
It continued: “If you do not provide such assurance by March 14, it will be our duty to intervene — to prevent the
image: Roger Hallam, who masterminded the Insulate Britain protests, has launched a new movement to target oil producers
